content: I don't really know how often I should bump Mathlib for a project like this (since it can be a little inconvenient), but I'm bumping Mathlib now (from v4.9.0-rc1 to v4.9.0-rc3). I'm planning to bump 1-2 times per month, but I could also do it more/less often. There were no fixes needed yet (that will probably be a temporary luxury).
